crimm.IO.MMCIFParser

class crimm.IO.MMCIFParser(first_model_only=True, use_bio_assembly=True, include_solvent=True, include_hydrogens=False, strict_parser=True, QUIET=False)

Parser class for standard mmCIF files from PDB

create_assembly_dict()

Return a dictionary of chains grouped by mmcif assembly ids under "pdbx_struct_assembly_gen".

create_atom_from_namedtuple(atom_entry)

Create an Atom object from the namedtuple of an "atom_site" entry from the mmCIF dict

Create a dictionary containing structured data from all "atom_site" fields in mmCIF.

create_model_template()

Set up empty templates for the chains in a template model.

Create a dictionary for the PolymerChain object from mmCIF.
